mapper.insert: INSERT INTO about_me(user_id, log_id, type, is_new, deleted, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{logId}, #{type}, #{isNew}, #{deleted}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE about_me SET deleted = TRUE WHERE log_id = #{logId} AND type = #{type} AND deleted = FALSE
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM about_me WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = FALSE
